articles.author: Jessica Lyons Hardcastle
articles.title: 'Thousands' of Cisco devices compromised in IOS XE attack - The Register
articles.description: Good news: There's a free scanner to check your kit. Bad news: Still no fix
articles.content:
Remember that critical zero-day bug Cisco disclosed yesterday? Well, it gets worse.
It now appears "thousands" of the networking giant's switches and routers have already been compromised by crimina… [+2929 chars]
